comm: opens up with a shortish delivery that is picked off the hips to long leg. Well done, boys. You spotted the inswing

squares Dhawan up with a good length ball that straightens off the deck. The batsman was hoping to work the angle in and get a single through midwicket. Has to settle for one to third man off the outside edge

spearing in at Dhawan and tags him on the full on the front boot! Huge appeal from the bowler and the cordon but the umpire says no. That was mighty close. Especially since he was beaten by a hint of swing away. In front of leg, might well have struck it
back of a length on the fourth stump, Dhawan is uncertain of his off stump and seems to be beaten

edged and taken! Starc continues where he left off against England. It's a teaser outside off and the fuller length drew Dhwan into that favourite cover drive of his. Except he doesn't account for the outswing again. Thick edge flies towards Finch at slip, who takes it over his head
lovely length to dart the ball back in at the right-hander, pings off Rahane's pads while he tries a flick and goes to long leg
easy sighter for Rahane as this is short and wide outside off, left well alone
back of a length in the off-stump corridor, tapped into the covers with soft hands
beaten on the grope outside off. Another good length ball straightens to beat the batsman who was intending to play the angle
crisp stroke to get off the mark. Inches forward to a full delivery angled in on off stump and rolls his wrists to send the ball past mid-on's left. Cautious stroke
keeps to his crease and defends a back of a length ball on middle, bit of an inside edge goes to fine leg
good length ball on middle and leg, Rahane turns it to square leg
works the angle across the right-hander and Rohit is happy to see it through to the keeper
strays a touch too straight and Rohit relies on those subcontinent wrists to tuck the ball to long leg
inside edge! That's very lucky! It was a bit short, but Starc has not provided the width to justify that cut shot. So very close to off stump, and instead it runs off to the boundary
oops, that time he's send the full, inswinger a bit too far down leg
back of a length and outside off, left to the keeper

magnificent stroke! He's taken on the short ball every time in the Tests and good technique helps him beat a diving Steven Smith at gully. Back and across and a sublime tap to send the ball to the point boundary
full and outside off to entice the drive, Rahane falls into the trap and is lucky not to get the outside edge. Mirror image of the ball that got Dhawan
full on off stump, defends the fourth delivery he has faced of the morning to mid-on
good length ball, around sixth stump, Rohit shoulders arms and wanders to square leg
gets him forward to a good length ball and pushes towards midwicket

lofted over the bowler's head! Phew, when he does things like that it makes you sit up and hack for breath. Fuller delivery outside off stump and he wades into the front foot to secure a straight six. And the MCG is a pretty big ground, remember

India run four! Beautiful timing from Rohit as he gets a good length ball on middle and clips it into the gap and towards deep midwicket. Faulkner hunts it down and looks back about a mile away from any set of stumps to see the batsman setting off for a fourth
back of a length and outside off, not bothered with
full and wide outside off, Rahane resists the temptation
good length ball probing Rahane's judgment of his off stump. He does well, stretching forward to cover his sticks and leave
back of a length on middle, Rahane defends under his eyes
fullish on middle and leg, Rahane prefers to use soft hands and a straightish face and finds midwicket
shortish on off stump, Rahane leaps off his feet and blunts the ball by his feet
opens the face and slides a shortish delivery to Smith at gully
full and wide and this time Rahane throws his hands at it. Gets a healthy outside edge that lobs Smith, who had propelled himself straight up, to deep third man
back of a length on middle, Rohit works it to short midwicket from deep in his crease
he's getting some good bounce, and a hint of straightening catches the outside edge as Rohit tries to close the face. Goes harmlessly to gully
full on middle and that affords Rohit an easy escape with a flick to deep square leg
fullish on off stump, Rahane is forward to block
clipped off his pads, but short midwicket is in the way. Good full length though, and he's got a bit of inswing going as well
good length ball outside off brings Rahane forward to block to mid-off. Only one run in his first over in international cricket
fuller delivery on off stump, Rohit has to jerk his bottom hand off the bat as it gets a bit more bounce than he anticipated
short and wide, Rohit is content not to play the scythe, swat, slap and other assorted s-starting synonyms for the cut
banged in short and it soars over the batsman's head as he pulls out from a hook
143kph, beaten with a beauty! Rohit knew this fuller ball was threatening his off stump, so he brings down a straight face to protect it. But Cummins gets the ball to seam away past the edge
140kph, short and wide outside off, too much so for the umpire's liking
finally cedes to the need to open the face and runs a short and wide delivery down to third man
back of a length and outside off, shuffles over to off and lifts his bat high over his head
good length ball on middle and leg, tucked away with lovely timing to deep midwicket

nicked and taken. There's that bounce that he seems to get and it bests Rahane's intention to cut. Top strike for a first one, and it was brought about by the pressure created and sustained at both ends. There wasn't enough room for the shot, but Rahane opted for it and pays the price
fuller delivery on off stump, pushed to mid-on

good length ball on off stump, Kohli defends. And he is standing a good few inches out of his crease. Well, he did that to Johnson in the Tests. Why would he do any different against a debutant, while playing in his favourite format
back of a length and outside off, slid down to third man
banged in short and Rohit settles under it. Too much height on that one says the ump
good length ball on off stump, run towards point off the open face.
into the pull too early, and he was dragging the bouncer from outside off and it was rising up at chest-height too. Mistimes to square leg
good length ball outside off, Rohit doesn't bother with it
fuller delivery brings him forward with a push to short cover
good length and outside off, Rohit attempts to pick the gap square on the off side but finds gully
overpitched and treated with considerable disdain! Pushed his balance forward, not so much his front foot, and went on the cover drive with all hands. Sublime timing
keeps leg side of the ball, which was short and runs it past a spectacularly diving Smith at gully. Uppish too, but Rohit secures a single to third man
back of a length on off stump, defended towards gully
shimmies down the pitch, adjusts to the bowler changing his length to short and pulls down to square leg. Sandhu isn't the quickest bowler around
back of a length on off stump, tapped towards short midwicket
full delivery skirted down the leg side and Rohit leaves it happily
back of a length and outside off, run down to third man
extra bounce again, this time against Kohli, who pulls his bottom hand off while defending the shortish delivery on off stump
picked off his hips, but Kohli directs the back of a length ball to short fine leg
waits on the shortish ball a shade outside off and steers it to third man
nudges a shortish delivery to deep fine leg and sprints away. Is he looking for two? Yep! And he beats a direct hit from the deep as well. Little check with the third ump ensures that fact
shortish on off stump, Kohli blocks it to point with half a blade
good length ball slid down leg, that's been happening a bit too often for Australia's liking today
drilled down the ground and mid-off has to put in a big dive. Manages to parry it to mid-on and keep it to a couple
full on middle and leg, Kohli is pushing forward dominantly and clips to long leg. Two again
good length ball, defended
full on on off stump, pushed back at Shane Watson
shortish, and Watson is able to derive some disconcerting bounce as well. Rohit was committed on the steer to third man and has to indulge in a roll of his wrists to keep it down
fuller delivery on off stump, forced to cover
jumps inside the line to work a good length ball to the right of short midwicket, Bailey is prowling that region, dives to grab the ball with one hand and throws quick enough. Only Kohli is quicker
back of a length on middle, picked away to deep square leg
fuller delivery on off stump, Kohli clips it back at the bowler.
snags the inside edge off a fuller ball outside off, Rohit was looking to defend and loses control of it. Gets off strike thanks to an alert Kohli who had seen the ball wander towards square leg
back of a length on middle, picked away to deep square leg as well
full on off stump, driven behind point quite calmly this time
fuller delivery on off stump, tapped towards mid-off and Kohli takes a couple of steps before realising there wasn't a single

so easily done! Kohli has perished to his own attacking intent. It was just a shade short, barely had room to free the hands. Short-armed pull came out and ends up as a top edge which is taken by the captain jogging in from mid-on.
jumps outside off to try and tuck a good length ball towards midwicket, gets a leading edge to cover
fuller delivery outside off, Rohit steps forward to block
gets forward to defend a good length ball on off stump
full and outside off, Rohit waits on the front foot and whips it to mid-on
shortish and outside off, run down to third man
shortish on middle and leg, Raina nudges it into the leg side and gets his first runs on this tour
absorbs the bounce on this shortish ball and plays with soft hands towards square leg, they want to steal a couple. But Australia are a bit too alert
fuller delivery outside off, Rohit lets it sail through to the keeper
full and a shade outside off, Rohit trusts his wrists again to try and beat mid-on. Not possible
attempts a shorter ball outside off, Rohit drops his wrists expecting it to bounce a lot more than it did. And it really should have as it went to the keeper
shortish and outside off, steered towards point
full and outside off, Rohit drives to mid-off
cramps him for room as Starc gets a shortish ball to dart in at Rohit. Soft hands blunt it at his feet. That's drinks
angles across the length delivery outside off, left alone
slightly shorter and closer to off stump, Raina stays back and defends
on length close to off stump, pushed back this time
short this time towards leg stump, Raina swat-pulls it behind square on leg for one
well outside off, Rohit cuts it late to guide it to third man
on length with the angle outside off, Raina defends it back
pushes the length delivery around off down to mid off
smacked for six! Short ball towards the batsman from the leg side, Rohit eyes it early and hammers it over the fine leg fielder with a pull for six
straighter and on length this time, he tries to tuck it to leg but doesn't connect
too wide outside off, but Rohit chases that well away from his body and misses. Called a wide
better delivery and better leave. This was closer to the batsman outside off with the angle and he let it go
slower offcutter, at 127kph, around the off stump, Rohit defends it back
too full and there's room too, Rohit drives it with one knee down on the ground to deep backward point
fullish just outside off, pushed down easily to long on for one
pokes and misses! Length delivery angled across Raina, he prods on the front foot and just misses
bit of hesitation for the single as Raina pushes that between point and cover point, but completed easily
back of length just outside off, turned to leg off the back foot for one
short ball for Raina, he pivots on the back foot and pulls it to deep square leg
slightly back of length towards the batsman, clipped to deep square leg and they are looking for two but there's time only for one
shortish and a shade outside off, steered to point
141kph, fullish on middle and leg and Rohit turns it to deep square leg
good length ball leaps into the keeper's gloves at 142 kph. Raina was content to not let his bat anywhere near it.
shortish delivery on middle, tucked to short midwicket
147kph, attempts a short ball, but it does not rise at all. Came only up to his stomach and Raina has swivelled onto the back foot to pull through midwicket
139kph, banged in a lot shorter, but despite the ball heading up over the shoulder, it is poorly targeted. Raina bends inside the line and takes the wide
shortish and outside off, Raina feels confident enough to slice it to deep third man
that's in Raina's wheelhouse. Dibbly-dobbly medium-pace and it's full and outside off as well. Leans forward and cracks it over Watson's head
fuller delivery on off stump, gets forward to block in front of point where Maxi swoops in and sends in a direct hit at the non-strikers'
good length ball on off stump, defended
goes short, but Raina is comfortable against it at this pace. Pulls it down and sends it behind square leg
good length ball a bit outside off, Rohit gets his bat down on it. Appears to have stayed low. And the Rohit crouch confirms it
back of a length and outside off, sliced to point
dabbed to third man as he waits for a short delivery to arrive outside off
uses the bowler's pace and his shortish length as he swivels on the back foot and pulls to the fine leg boundary
keeps back and runs a short ball outside off to third man
gets across outside off to a shortish delivery and defends
145kph, too full to be camping back and he is beaten for pace as well! Looks to steer the ball to third man and comes up with a whole lot of air
jumps across outside off and clips a good length ball behind square leg
full on leg stump, Raina decides it just has to go and plays a fluent whip through midwicket. That was emphatic
turned away through midwicket
gets across and clips a good length ball to deep square leg
gets across outside off and pulls the short ball on middle to long leg
opens the face against a back of a length delivery and finds point
gets forward to a good length ball and drives on the up to deep cover
back of a length on off stump, dabbed in front of point as Rohit sets off. Denied
shortish on middle and off, blocked
tries to beat gully with the open face against a back of a length delivery outside off, but Smith dives to his left and denies him again
so what does Rohit do? He flies down the pitch like a truck in a high speed chase and hammers a length ball handsomely over long-on to bring up his fifty. Emphatic
full and outside off, whipped away to deep midwicket. Risky, but this pitch is not offering any more sideways movement

fuller delivery on off stump, pushed to mid-off. The throw came in considering Rohit was out of his crease, the ball went through Rohit's legs and Haddin missed it. Was there a deflection? Single stolen
fuller delivery on off stump, defended carefully
gets across and whips it square on the leg side
banged in short and Raina decides it's gained too much height for him to pull. Leaves it well alone
good length ball wandering down the leg side, Raina's flick can't reach it
jumps back and pulls to deep square leg
good length ball on off stump, defended with soft hands towards point
spliced it, goes uppishly but it lands where there is no one posted - around short third man. Back of a length delivery on off stump misbehaves to have Rohit in trouble
tucked in front of square leg to get off strike
gets across outside off to turn a good length ball through square leg
good length ball outside off seemed destined to end up a third man, but it doens't bounce as much and Rohit bunts it towards Haddin
think he picked the back of the hand slower ball and went down for a lap sweep, only problem is that kind of delivery bounces on a true pitch. Rohit is struck on the bicep
another slower ball on off stump, whipped to long-on
runs a shortish delivery with a little room outside off to deep third man
gets down the track, but Sandhu's extra bounce foils Raina's intent. Has to stick to defending a shortish ball
opens the face and runs a back of a length delivery to point
keeps back to block a shortish delivery on and around off stump
offcutter from Sandhu and he keeps getting extra bounce. Raina uses soft hands to dab it into the leg side and grab a single

appeal. loud and concerted from Sandhu. Then there's a shy at the stumps as well. That certainly would have been out. Struck on the back pad and he was buckling over, impact seemed ot be on off stump but Sandhu's natural bounce goes against him this time. And there was some bat too. Steven Smith wasn't worried about the appeal though, he saw Rohit sluggish to set off and sent down a good throw at the bowler's end. Missed the stumps with the batsman yards out
jumps inside the line and tucks a good length ball through square leg
flighted on leg stump, nudged to short midwicket
eases down the pitch and lifts the good length ball over extra cover. Took it off middle stump and he'd made his own room
stays back to a good length delivery and runs it towards point
down the track and drives towards mid-on
short and a bit outside off, Rohit exploits it as he ramps it to deep third man
gets back into his crease to nudge a shortish delivery in front of square leg
offcutter on middle and leg, and the good length ball comes up towards Rohit's hips. Turned towards midwicket
he's been getting a lot of his runs in that square leg region, shuffling across and using the shortish length to his advantage.
short ball on leg stump, Rohit has swivelled and pulled towards the long leg boundary. It's a big one down there, and India take three
banged in short and Raina was swift to get outside the line and pull to the fine leg boundary
flighted on off stump, Rohit lunges forward to block
gets back to a flatter delivery and threads it through the covers. Can't take on a fast bowler's arm, It was Cummins
lurches down the track, but can't quite reach the pitch. Slugs it away wide of mid-on for a single
another attempt at reaching the pitch, but Maxwell's controlled his flight quite well again. Made Raina reach outside off and secures an outside edge. But it travels to the third man boundary
shimmies down and pushes at a length ball to mid-off
goes back to a flatter delivery and turns it to midwicket
back of a length on off stump, Rohit looks for a flick and inside edges onto pad
pushed down the ground to long-on
gets across on off stump to defend a back of a length delivery
good shot from Raina again as he picks the gap at fine leg. Strays in line does Sandhu with his shortish delivery and it's been pulled with lovely control

runs down the track while trying to make room for himself. Sandhu cramps him for room with an offcutter. Pushed towards the covers. No single there and Raina has to employ a full-length dive to save himself from Maxi's direct hit
another slower ball on middle and off, defended
slid off the open face as Faulkner bowls short and works the angle across the right-hander
good length ball on middle and off, Raina taps it towards mid-on and sets off. Maxwell does not allow the single and sends Raina scampering back again
turned into the leg side as he gets back and across to a good length ball outside off
lands a leg-stump slower ball to which Raina attempts a sweep. But since the ball slides down, the umpire has called wide
back of the hand slower ball goes awry as it ends up a beamer outside off and Raina leaps up off his feet to lash it to deep third man
back of a length on off stump, defended
fullish on middle and leg, kept out
gets inside the line and pulls a shortish delivery to deep square leg. Rohit wants two and gets it off a weakish throw from Sandhu. Looks like it's drinks
back of a length on off stump, Raina decides to stay inside the line this time and blocks
strays on the pads and it's been clipped to long leg quite easily
full on off stump, Rohit pushes past the bowler before he could get down to it
slower ball, but its on leg stump. Clipped through midwicket
offcutter a bit outside off, defended with an open face
banged in and Rohit's been very good on the pull today. Besides, Sandhu forgot to wave his magic wand and get this ball to bounce high enough.
goes back to block a shortish delivery and picks a single into the covers
shortish on leg stump, tucked away off the hips to long leg
nails the back of the hand slower ball as he beats the flashing Raina blade outside off
this time the batsman spots the variation, waits for it and runs the shortish delivery down to deep third man
a bit of bounce on the back-of-the-hand slower ball. Rohit attempts a flick and ends up with an inside edge that floats over the leg stump. Into the nineties
boundary to third man this time and Rohit controls it far better. Sees the room attached to the slower ball and dabs an open face on it
good length ball on off stump, defended stoutly
change of pace slides down leg with Raina moving across to off stump. Wide called
opens the face and runs the ball to point
gets across and clips to deep square leg
waits on a shortish delivery on the fourth stump and runs it towards short third man. No single there
flicks a good length ball on middle, no single there either with short midwicket racing in. Throw comes in at the non-strikers' and it was wide enough that Raina doesn't even bother grounding his bat
shortish on leg stump, nudged towards fine leg
full and outside off, Raina clips it through midwicket to secure a fifty. A much-needed one in terms of where India were when he came in
fuller delivery outside off, slid off the front foot to deep third man
full and outside off, Raina plants the open face down on it to get a single behind point
rides the bounce on this short delivery outside off to beat a diving point
he's thrown it away! It was a fuller delivery outside off and Raina got on the front foot and hacked it straight at mid-on. And you know what happens when Australia get an opening...
shortish on off stump, Rohit dabs towards point
angled into the pads off a fuller length and Rohit clips to long leg. Moves to 99, one more run to become the second Indian to make a century at the MCG
attempts a yorker first up, but can't quite land it. Dhoni protects his off stump
good length ball, with a hint of shape back in at Dhoni. Defended
that's a missile! Target set on the point boundary the minute Cummins bowled short and wide. India's commander yells fire one!
fuller delivery on off stump, defended towards the covers

fuller delivery, angled across him. Outside edge to secure the run he wants to cross over to a hundred! The first by an Indian at the MCG since Jan 2000, and only the second in history. Raises his bat to the crowd and gets a pat on the back from his captain. He's weathered the new ball, got over his strike rate issues and has controlled the innings quite well
back of a length and outside off, not bothered with
a bit fuller as Starc tests Dhoni outside off, happy to leave this alone as well
good length ball outside off, Dhoni gets across and lifts his bat over his head
good length ball outside off, Dhoni lets Haddin worry about it
full and wide, Dhoni slashes to deep third man with an open face
good pace and better direction on this good length ball on middle, tucked to mid-on
rises up with a shortish ball outside off and slaps it to point
offcutter on off stump, Dhoni is back with a punch to mid-off
shortish on off stump, Dhoni jumps back and across and flicks through to midwicket
gets up on his toes to turn a shortish delivery on off stump towards square leg
punches a shortish delivery into the covers and races across to the other end
punishes Faulkner for straying in line with the slower ball. Clipped off the thigh pad to the fine leg boundary, off the gloves though
back to normal pace with the fuller ball on off stump, defended
full on off stump, drilled to mid-off
fuller delivery on off stump, Dhoni gets behind it
good length ball on off stump, defended
fuller delivery on off stump, pushed to mid-off
goes back in his crease to turn the shortish delivery at 140 kph to deep backward square leg
goes for a clip off a good length ball on off stump, says wait as midwicket attempts to stop it, then jogs away after it passes him
142kph, gets up on his toes against a short delivery on off stump, run down to point
picks up the short ball and hammers it away! This was miles in front of midwicket! What a lusty blow, and he took it off the front foot as well.
shortish and outside off, steered to deep third man. He's becoming too predictable with the length
139kph, seems to stick in the pitch a bit more and gain some extra bounce. Dhoni softens his grip and clips into the leg side
back-of-the-hand slower ball pitched full on off stump, defended off the inside edge
leans into a square drive against a fuller delivery outside off for a couple of runs
wafts at a good length ball outside off and is beaten, hundred or not that little loose shot ends up surfacing for Rohit
good length ball on middle and off, picked away to deep midwicket
slower ball on the legs, Dhoni nudges it to fine leg
fuller delivery on off stump, eased through the covers
gets off his feet to negotiate the bounce of this shortish offcutter on off stump
slower ball goes short and Dhoni has cracked a pull to long leg
slants a good length ball a long way down leg, far enough that Haddin can't reach it with a dive to his left
gets across on off stump and works a good length ball to short fine leg. Good thing he got bat to that
backs away, but he is fooled by Sandhu's offcutter. Tries to hack it through midwicket and gets an inside edge
stays a bit low does this short, slower ball and Rohit pulls to long leg
yawning open spaces on the on side and Dhoni exploits them with a deft flick. Deep midwicket has lots of ground to cover, before which the Indians have taken a couple
full and wide, called as much by the umpire
full and slid across the right-hander, but an open face from Rohit has the ball scurrying to the third man boundary. Nicely placed
settles on off stump and drives a fuller delivery into the covers
lands a yorker on off stump, which Rohit jabs into the covers for a single
142kph, spears in a fuller delivery on middle and leg. A bit of curl away from the batsman, to take the leading edge while he was attempting a flick
sliced into the covers as he camps back, knowing it will be quite full and moving across him
finds deep third man this time as Starc searches for the wide yorker
cramps him for room with a slower length ball, but there is no one inside the circle to prevent the mis-hit flick from amounting to a couple of runs
shortish and on off stump, so Rohit makes his own room and belts it to point. Good work there as he gets a hand on it and keeps it to a single
shortish on leg stump, goes for a pull but doesn't quite connect well. Hit high on the bat for a single to long leg
slower ball, picked and clattered to the wide long-on boundary! Good, long stride and a clean swing of the arms against the fuller ball. Poor from Sandhu for affording the room to swing the arms
shortish on off stump, pulled off the front foot to long leg
lots of slower balls being employed of varying lengths, this one is shorter and Dhoni pulls to long leg as well
flashing blade of Dhoni doesn't succeed when Starc cramps him up. Shortish delivery on fourth-fifth stump. Finds point
his penultimate over of the match and he secures a huge strike for Australia. The offcutter has very little room but Dhoni wants to slice it. Gets a thick inside edge and it crashes into the stumps
cuts him in half with a full, fast inswinger. Akshar wants the booming cover drive, has to settle for his off stump being intact
there goes another domino! Spearing yorker strikes the back leg with Akshar playing all around it. Would that have missed leg? Beaten for pace, beaten for movement and India are slipping
lovely length from Starc, keeps it right up there on off stump and Ashwin is capably behind it
<s>ends his spell with a double-wicket maiden</s>! Oops, he still has an over left. Brilliant yorker on off stump and Ashwin does well to get his bat down
shortish on middle and off, turned through midwicket
short delivery, pulled to long leg
shortish on middle and off, picked away to deep square leg
sliced through to the sweeper
lands it full on off stump, Ashwin digs it out
curls in late for Sandhu and Ashwin manages an inside edge to long leg. Ends a good first showing in ODIs
starts off with the slower ball on off stump, Ashwin tries to exploit the huge gap in front of square on the leg side but fails. Sends the flick back at the bowler
waits on the shortish ball and slides it down to third man
107kph, runs at Faulkner and slogs wildly, but the change of pace fools him. Off side is where the fielders are up and he goes cow corner. Misses
shortish and cramping him on middle and leg, Rohit dabs it through point
goes for the paddle-pull and finds short fine leg
length, that's what Rohit wants in this stage and he stays still, gets his balance right as he clears the front leg and lashes it over the long-on boundary
slower short ball slips beneath Ashwin's pull
139kph, lovely stroke from Ashwin as he lines up a shortish ball angled in on off stump and cuts it quite late to third man
steps forward to a Cummins short ball and flat batted to long-on
gets across on off stump to try and pick the length ball off his toes. Appeal from Cummins for leg before but that would have gone down leg
slower short ball, Rohit spotted it and belts it to midwicket for a single
lashed over the covers as he makes room against the back of a length delivery on off stump. But there is a sweeper in place

is that his fifth? No, his new-ball partner Cummins drops it! Full and a shade wide, Ashwin did his bit by clearing the front leg and swinging for the cover fend. But gets a leading edge and the sweeper running in can't grab hold
full delivery angled across Rohit, but he goes for a flick and gets a leading edge to deep third man
wanders away outside off to try a scoop, but Starc bowls it too full for Ashwin to get under. Has to settle for a leg bye

caught on the edge of the circle, that is Starc's fifth and it comes off his worst ball of the day - a full toss. Rohit was looking for quick runs, but his cow-corner club comes low off the inside half of the bat and picks out midwicket

cleaned him up! that's six! Changed the angle of delivery and came around the wicket to Bhuvi, the new batsman. It was full, it was speared in on middle. The batsman stayed beside the ball to open up the off side, but fails to connect with his shovel drive. Starc smile might as well translate as 'you miss, I hit'
good yorker on off stump and Shami does well to prevent three in three
starts off with the slower ball outside off. dabbed to short third man. Not quite enough pace for Ashwin to exploit
tucked through midwicket to return strike to the better batsman. Well done, Shami. Bat on ball.
the back of the hand slower ball is short on middle, Ashwin pulls off the front foot and misses. Gripped in the pitch and bounced a bit more
moves leg side, Faulkner follows him with a back of a length delivery which has been slogged to deep square leg
length on off stump, Shami looks for the stands beyond long-on but mistimes it. Single to deep midwicket
and they secure a bye off the last ball. Only five runs off it, as Ashwin ran away outside off to scoop the fuller ball and misses
swings it in a little bit on length outside off, left alone
wider outside off and coming in again, Finch chops it to point
shorter and wider outside off now, cut straight to point again
mixes it up with an outswinger this time, but it's well outside off for a wide
length delivery swinging away a bit, pushed with a thickish edge down to third man for one
back of length from leg towards middle, good bounce makes Warner go back and hop to defend it to leg
fullish outside off now, pushed through the covers off the front foot in the gap, Kohli chases and slides to pull it in
back of length on the legs, clipped off the pads after a hop on the back foot to deep square leg for two
back of length towards middle this time, tucked to midwicket and the fielder gets a direct hit at non-striker's. No overthrows
144kph, induces the outside edge but it flies well past second slip to third man for one. Was slightly back of length outside off and it moved away as Warner defended off the back foot
flashes at it and gets four over the slips! It was pretty wide and short, Finch didn't time it very well but got enough to send it over slip
this one's pretty wide too and swings away further outside off for a wide
crunching drive, that looked glorious! Full outside off with the away movement and Finch got on top of it with an authoritative cover drive for four
drifts towards the pads now from back of of length, deflects it down behind square for a leg bye
gets back and across against a shortish delivery, contact was a bit high on the bat as he cuts
mild appeal from Bhuvi as he corrects his length and line on middle. Might have been sliding down
picked away through to long leg
leaps to his left at cover and lifts himself onto his knees soon after to prevent Finch from going for a single. Deserved some runs considering the timing on that back-foot cover drive
clipped through midwicket as he gets in line with a length ball on middle
good length ball a shade outside off, gets some seam away as well, gets Finch's respect as well as he leaves
oh dear, that's a terrible delivery to start off with. And Warner gleefully sends it away to the fine leg boundary. Short, way down leg and all the batsman had to do was help it away
143 kph, short and sliding down leg again. This time Warner is happy to collect the wide
much better, he needs to stick in that off-stump region. Back of a length delivery also keeps Warner honest
one-legged pull to the square leg boundary, but this was the bowler's mistake again. Bowling short with the new ball, bowling on leg stump with the new ball. No pressure on Australia now
pendulums back to off stump and Warner pushes to mid-off
145kph, shortish on and around off stump, defended
keeps to the crease and hits through the line of a back of a length delivery and finds mid-off

back of a length, yet Finch is confidently forward and taps to mid-off, who is under pressure as Finch sets off. Direct hit would have caught him short at the non-strikers', with Finch not diving. Ends up with an overthrow
tight line on off stump, Finch can only block down the pitch
back of a length on off stump, defended carefully
shortish and outside off, Finch goes for the cut but seems to check it at the last minute
back of a length on off stump, Finch gets behind it
down the track to try and mess up Bhuvi's lovely lengths, ends up with an inside edge for his trouble and he retains strike as it goes towards square leg
brings Finch forward to protect his off stump. He should bowl better at the right-hander
attempts a forcing drive off a good length ball on off stump, gets it off the inside of the bat and Shami gets a hand on it while following through
seems to get a bit of a bottom edge to a good length ball only a shade outside off. Single to deep third man
takes on the short ball, with the field set for it! Nearly carries all the way to Akshar at deep square leg.
139 kph, has Finch in a spot of bother as he pings a shortish delivery down on off stump. Squares him up as the batsman uses an open face to run down to point
good length on off stump, Finch defends to mid-off and Shami walks back with a far better over under his belt. Had his pace up, had his radar right, just needs to reproduce it over and over and over
firmly behind a back of a length delivery on off stump
opens the face against a shortish ball and slices it to deep point
stands up tall and punches to the left of mid-off. Lovely straight bat coming down on the back of a length delivery
oof, did the ball clip off stump?! Or did it take the bottom of the bat? Definitely hit the bottom of the bat and it veers back towards the stumps, but misses it by a whisker!
Rohit has a direct hit, but Warner is well home after a push towards mid-off. Decent throw off that angle, but despite being on the back foot Warner was immensely quick off the blocks
gets back and across and tucks the shortish delivery away towards midwicket
width offered and Finch accepts the present as he flays the fuller ball over mid-off. Powerful stroke
decides to go along the ground this time as he drives a good length ball into the covers
seems to be right in line of the stumps, but he is able to flick the good length ball off his legs to deep midwicket
despairing dive from Kohli at deep square leg, but Warner's pull has too much heat on it. Shami errs by bowling short and a bit too straight
stands and delivers a whip, which mid-on does well to stop, diving away to his right
goes full on the pads this time and Warner works it to deep midwicket and takes on Virat Kohli's throw. Big dive, easily home
fuller delivery on middle and leg, Finch defends towards mid-on
keeps to the crease and pushes a good length ball into the covers
gets the bottom of the bat again! We should really get on a name for that ball from Bhuvi. Finch was stepping forward to block, but the ball wanders behind him to slip
great work from short point, Suresh Raina moves to his right and stops a cracking cut shot. The deflection though is potential for a single and Warner capitalises
shortish, but not quite wide enough. Warner slaps it to cover
picked away off his hips to long leg. Has the leg-side short-ball bug caught Bhuvi too?

skies it! Raina calls for it immediately and yells in delight after completing a soft dismissal. It was short of a good length, but Warner's front foot press works against him. Then he decided to play a sort of a pull shot when there wasn't much room. Ends up spooning a simple catch at extra cover, which was well taken.
full and slipping down leg, Finch helps it away to long leg
starts well against the new man, probing just a shade outside off with that in-between length. But to Watson and his famous front-foot press, that doesn't matter. Leaves it
gets forward and blocks a back of a length delivery to cover
offcutter from Umesh and there is a call of "catch it" from the Indian fielders, but the flick has bisected midwicket and mid-on
pushes him back with a short ball on off stump, defended
good length ball on fifth stump, Finch is caught in the crease as he pushes to mid-off
gets forward to the fuller ball outside off and taps to cover
solid stride forward to defend a fuller delivery to cover
loosens the grip on his bat, runs a back of a length delivery to third man and secures a single
just short of a good length on middle, Watson picks short midwicket with a flick
reaches forward to drive a fuller ball outside off on the up, mistimes it to mid-off. Good control of length from Bhuvi
shortish delivery on off stump, Finch blocks
offcutter just a bit outside off, defended into the covers
back of a length on fifth stump, Finch brings down a straight bat
forces a good length ball to cover point. India are stringing together a good stretch of dots now
beaten off a beautiful delivery, and the pressure that's been built. Attempts something extravagant off a back of a length delivery outside off as he steps forward ti drive on the up
141kph, gets the ball to straighten and beat Finch all ends up! Finishes with a maiden as India concede only eight runs in the last four overs, and the wicket of Warner
drags the length short and Watson camps back in his crease and cuts behind point. Not the best start from yet another Indian bowler
that's quicker and it skids into Watson way too quick for the pull. Mistimes into the leg side
tossed up on middle and leg, tucked to short midwicket
a bit short again and Watson has sliced it to the sweeper
fuller delivery on middle and leg, Finch drives back at the bowler
fired in on middle, Finch keeps it out
wafts outside off and is beaten by a back of a length delivery outside off. Good channels from Umesh
full, but it has width. The search for swing backfires on Umesh as Watson drives on the up and lifts it over extra cover
a bit of extra bounce for Umesh as he hits back of a length and outside off, Watson dabs it to third man
shortish on middle and leg, the batsman hops up off his feet to find mid-on
short and wide, Watson slaps it high over point and wide of third man. Well placed, easy boundary
corrects his line and length and keeps Watson to a dot as he seeks the top of off stump
nudged to the left of short midiwcket as Akshar does what he does - cramp the batsman for room with his darts

huge appeal from Akshar as Finch attempts something different. Gets a decent stride forward to sweep a fuller ball on off stump. Just a hint of turn, and perhaps the umpire thinks it would miss the target. Kohli is gutted, even comes up to ask the ump for a clarification. The impact might have been outside off
pressure release as the ball is a bit short and Shami is not the best man at point, can't get across to his left fast enough
tapped away towards short midwicket
tossed up on off stump, driven to mid-off
pushed to mid-off to end the over
141kph, short and wide, but his zip and extra bounce saves him from a Watson cut
back of a length on off stump, defended into the covers where Kohli is very alert
not this time. Watson gets his second chance at a short and wide delight and he beats point comfortably
back of a length on middle, Watson clips it to long leg and secures an easy two
fuller delivery on off stump, tapped to the right of mid-on
stands up tall behind the back of a length delivery and punches it down to mid-off
driven to long-off as he stays inside the line of a tossed up delivery outside off
moves back and slices a flatter delivery off the stumps to deep point
fast and full on off stump and Watson, having gone back, defends just in time
gets down the track to drive the fuller delivery to long-on
fired in on leg stump, too quick for Finch and his straight drive
rapped on the pads again, but his angle into the batsman might be working against him on this shout. Across-the-line whip from Finch but he survives to have a drink and clear his mind
starts a bit too straight and he is picked away to long leg.
good length ball on off stump brings Watson forward to block
good length ball on middle, picked away to square leg
moves around the wicket to Finch and he defends the length ball on off stump
picks up the length ball this time and wallops it to deep square leg with a slog sweep
fluent movement towards the pitch of the ball and Watson unleashes impressive power to slam the good length ball into the sightscreen. Pressure on Ashwin straight away
back of a length on off stump, Finch gets up tall and punches to cover
oof! skids off the deck and beats Finch's cut shot. Quite close to off stump as well
pushed back at the bowler with a straight bat
tries to make his own room by moving leg side of the ball, but can't pierce the cover field
this time Akshar provides a hint of width and it's been sliced through cover
backs away and punches the flatter delivery outside off through cover. That's Australia's hundred
good length ball on off stump, Watson defends carefully
a bit slower through the air and Watson has to check his flick. Mild leading edge, but it falls short of Ashwin's right
turned away through square leg as Ashwin bowls his usual, quickish pace on leg stump
a touch more bounce on leg stump and Finch works the ball, one-handed, to short fine leg
gets down the track and works the good length ball on leg stump to deep square leg
back over the wicket to Watson who pushes a shortish delivery outside off towards cover
full on middle, Finch drives at mid-off
stays beside the ball and crunches the fuller delivery to long-off
pushed to long-off from the back foot
stays back to defend a flatter, quicker delivery on middle and leg
shortish and outside off, Finch cuts to the sweeper
too full to cut and Watson is beaten outside off
cramps him up on leg stump and Finch's flick to a good length ball finds short midwicket
worked to short fine leg and Dhawan fumbles to allow an easy single
flighted on off stump, eased to midwicket
stays back against a good length ball and flicks it to deep midwicket
jumps outside leg to loosen Ashwin's strangle and succeeds as he slaps the short ball through the covers.
down the track, but Ashwin limits his flight and keeps it to a single through a square-leg clip
driven solidly to long-off. Dhoni's kept a mid-off as well.
opens the face and slices a good length ball from off stump into the covers
drilled to long-on as Akshar flights in on middle and leg

slugs across the line and yells at himself as his off stump is knocked back. The Dhoni mantra works, reduce the runs, limit the boundaries and lure the mistake. Good, tight bowling from the left-arm darter
good length ball on off stump, defended
down the track with a whip to mid-on. No single there, SPD
nudged through midwicket for a single
slows it up on off stump, Smith reaches forward to defend
movevs back and across to clip a good length ball to square leg
opens the face against a good length ball that goes on with the arm. Adjusts late there

clipped off the pads and Smith wants to get off the mark. Might be a risky run here, and the umps are calling for a second look. Excellent work from Dhoni who deflects the incoming throw onto the stumps. Sort of like a late cut played just with his hands and no bat
clipped away to deep midwicket
fuller delivery outside off brings out the Finch cover drive. Handsome stroke, and he does appear far more solid against pace
uses the width on offer and sends the length ball wandering away to third man
fuller delivery on off stump, defended
slower ball on middle and off, Finch whips it away through midwicket and picks up a couple that takes him to fifty
good length ball on off stump, defended
right up there on off stump and Finch's bat skews in his hands as he drives wider of mid-on than he intended
down the track to clip a flatter delivery on leg stump to deep midwicket
stays on the back foot and clips a shortish delivery to deep square leg
sees a hint of width outside off, but mistimes the flat-batted thump into the covers
works away a good length ball towards midwicket
short and outside leg stump, Smith deftly nudges it to deep midwicket
reaches forward to a good length ball and taps it back at the bowler
sweetly struck! It wasn't such a bad ball, but Smith is in such good form that he stands and magic wands it back down the pitch. Sublime straight drive
good length a shade outside off, defended
143kph, searing yorker on middle and off, Smith is able to dig it out
fullish on off stump, Smith though is just as happy blocking off the back foot
strays on middle and leg and Smith's whirling wrists sends the ball packing to long leg
banged in, but Smith is quite good at dealing with those. Swivels on the back foot and pulls it to long leg as well
goes back and tucks it to short midwicket. Good work from the man diving to his right
waits a touch more and nudges the good length ball through to deep square leg
back and across to work the flat delivery off leg stump to deep square leg and they trot through for a couple. This around-the-wicket ploy is no longer working to contain
tapped in front of square leg for a single
beats him in flight, or lack of it, as Smith steps forward to flick a good length delivery through midwicket. Sneaks between bat and pad and to third man for a single
pushed into the covers
shortish on off stump, Smith tucks it in front of square leg
gets forward to a back of a length delivery on off stump, tapped into the covers
slips down leg and Finch allows it to skirt past him and to the keeper
punched to long-off, after Rain lets a straight forward pick-up elude him. Didn't bend down enough. Rare that, a Raina misfield
gets across on off stump and picks a fuller delivery on middle to long leg
solid drive to long-off against a back of a length delivery outside off
easily done as he judges the line of a shortish delivery to be outside off and runs it to deep third man
down the track to push a flatter delivery straight of midiwcket
he bowls fast and flat, Smith does very little as he gives the ball some direction off the open face, beats short third man and tucks into clever boundary
goes back and taps a length delivery to long-on
pushed to long-off
cut away, and it didn't have all that much room. Just quick feet to get him back and excellent control with his hands to beat point
full on middle, pushed back at the bowler
was there an edge? Dhoni had come up to the stumps and has to negotiate a bit of extra bounce. Finch didnt' do well against it, and Dhoni can't do much better either. Very difficult chance
worked away to midwicket
opens the face on a short and wide delivery and secures a single to third man
back of a length and Finch does better against this one as he softens his grip and rides the bounce to point
takes a length ball on off stump and dabs it to deep third man
surprise, surprise, a slider down leg. Finch can't connect with the sweep, but will take the wide
fuller delivery on off stump brings Finch forward with a slap over the long-on boundary. Got it more near the bottom of the bat, but he's got enough power, does Finch
backs away and slaps a flatter delivery to cover
good length ball on off stump, cramps Finch up even if he had tried to make his own room
turned away through midwicket for a couple. The huge MCG outfield is finding India's fielders out
nudged through square leg
good length ball on off stump, drilled to short midwicket
starts well here as he bowls a good length outside off and keeps Finch to a defensive push
shortish on middle, Finch tickles it behind square leg and races across for a couple of runs before Akshar at long leg can come up to the ball
back of a length on off stump, Finch uses soft hands to tap the ball into the covers and grab a quick, well-judged single
a touch slower and a shade outside off, defended
full and sliding down, Smith gets inside the line and glances it to the long leg boundary. Effortless
gets back and across to a shortish delivery on off stump and blocks
good length ball a bit outside off, Finch can only defend
down the leg side and it misses Finch's shovel sweep. Wide though

slog swept to the straight boundary! Again, it's not off the middle but it carries well over the boundary. Well, if the front line spinners didn't trouble Australia on this flat deck, what hope does Raina have
goes back to a good length ball and clips it through the leg side
gets up tall and punches a good length ball to long-off

beautiful shot! Take a bow, Smith. But he won't he has a job to do. And only a little bit of it might involve manufacturing a boundary like that with the required rate only at 5. Makes room and slices a flat delivery from a shade outside off stump to the point boundary
opens the face to a good length ball and finds a single to deep third man
back of a length outside off, defended
stays back against a fuller delivery outside off and lets it run off the open face to deep third man
invites third man into the game with a glide as this too is short and wide outside off
back of a length on off stump, defended
full and slanted down leg, Finch isn't able to cash in. Gets an inside edge to long leg
a bit short and wide outside off, Finch is forward and lobs it over point
fuller delivery on off stump, Finch is onto it a bit too quickly and gets an outside edge into the covers
leaps off his feet to negotiate a short ball on off stump, keeps it down towards square leg for a single
pushes an open face in line with a wide yorker and gets a single to third man
back of a length on off stump, slid to point
lovely timing on his flick and he is disappointed at finding short midwicket. Loud call of "Argh" is heard on the stump mic. Drinks, it appears
good length on off stump, punched to long-off
slid into the pads and Finch wears it, having been too slow on the flick
tucked to the right of midwicket as Akshar darts in on middle and leg
pushed to long-on as the flat, length ball reaches him on leg stump
slips down leg, as he fears Finch running at him. Dhoni does well to take it
worked away to short fine leg for a single
flighted on off stump, driven smartly to long-on
wants the yorker, but gets the low full toss and has to prevent a Smith straight drive from getting past him
a shade short and outside off, Smith rides it to point. The required rate is under five now...
opens the face to beat point comfortably this time as Shami bowls short and wide. That's his 1000th ODI run
slower ball, picked up by Finch as he drives to mid-off and sets off for a quick single. Makes it despite the throw
full and outside off, stroked to mid-off
shortish on middle and off, nudged to short midwicket
fired in on middle and leg, driven to long-on
only the smallest bit of room, but Smith has planted his front leg down, opened the face and drills the ball through point
pushed past mid-off
a touch slower on off stump, defended
whipped past short midwicket and he takes on the mid-on, who is right on the edge of the circle. India are doing nothing to stop Australia here.
down the track and whipped to short midwicket
banged in short and Finch goes for a pull after pushing his balance back, too high for him
seeks the blockhole on and around off stump, jammed into the covers
offcutter at the base of off stump, Smith nails a straight drive and the stumps and forces Finch to jump back into the crease
oops, he's swatted a slower bouncer right at short midwicket! Played with total control for the length of his innings but Shami did well to get enough height behind that ball to foil Smith's timing
rides the short ball down to deep third man
gets back to a shortish delivery on off stump and tucks it through midwicket
jogs in and bowls the customary slip down the leg side

nicks to the keeper! Finch misses out on a hundred on his home ground. Looks to force a short ball that seems to gain a bit more bounce than he expected. Feather through the keeper gives India a bit of a boost
139kph, back of a length on middle, sends Bailey back into his crease and keeps it to a single to long leg. Skidder from Umesh
what happened there?! Maxi had pulled his eyes off the ball, plonked his bat up like a periscope and it leaps off the face, wide of slip and gives him a single
short ball again and Bailey pulls to long leg
fullish delivery on off stump, defended off the back foot
banged in short, but it wanders a bit too far down leg
fuller delivery on off stump, defended
flighted on middle, driven to long-on
shortish on middle and leg, Maxwell clips to deep square leg
flighted outside off, Bailey defends to mid-off
down the track to the pitch of the flighted delivery outside off and whips it to long-on. Almost close to Ashwin's outstretched right hand
good length ball on middle, defended
dusts out the reverse sweep, but finds point
back of a good length outside off keeps Bailey honest
defends a shortish delivery on off stump
that's the 10th wide of the innings. Slipping down leg as Bailey fails to connect with the leg glance
back of a length on middle, defended
fuller delivery outside off, Bailey was into the drive too early and forgot to move his feet too. Inside edge wide of mid-on
banged in outside off, Maxi ramps it up over the slip. Third man is fine enough to cut it short of the boundary
back of a length on off stump, defended. Only three runs off that over then
flighted on leg stump, Maxi attempts to make room but has to stay content with a push to long-on

has he done it? Yes! Beautiful stumping! Good length ball sliding down leg, Bailey attempts a flick and overbalances and that fraction of a second is enough for Dhoni to jump across and flick the bails. Oh, and HotSpot says there was a nick in there too so it is actually a catch
flighted on leg stump, pushed to long-on
goes back to a good length ball on leg stump and strikes Maxi on the pads as he plays a flick
down the track and pummels a length ball over the straight boundary. Clean ball-striking

goes for the encore, but he has to settle for a four this time. Jumps down the track and clatters another good length ball into the sightscreen and away goes the advantage India whisked out of nothing
back of a length and outside off, gets a bottom edge behind the wicket
fuller delivery on middle and leg, pushed to long-on
fuller delivery outside off, pushed into the covers
top-class yorker from Umesh as this one reverses back in at Maxi! Only barely managed to protect middle stump and nearly topples off his feet
back of a length and zips in at Maxi off the deck, forces him to pull his bottom hand off as he nudges it into the leg side
full and spearing in on leg stump, clipped to short midwicket
pitched up on off stump, driven back at the bowler
chopped through the covers as he drags his length short and gives some room
fuller delivery on middle, eased into the covers and the Indian contingent at MCG roars
spears in on leg stump and it's a full toss, Maxi works it to deep midwicket
lifts him over extra cover, and it just about lobs Rohit who was chasing after it. Maxi moved leg side to make more of a good length ball than it merited
uses his wrists to try and flick a flatter delivery to long-on, Akshar throws himself to his right and parries it to midwicket
preempted that! Lovely change up from Shami as he slides a slower ball wide outside off to beat Maxi's desire to run down the track while making room for himself
back of a length and outside off, not enough room for Maxi to exploit with the punch through point

slower ball! Taken! Maxi has been sent back by a legcutter. He had been rushing down the track, has to adjust. Attempts a flick and gets it quite high on the bat to lob a simple catch back at the bowler.
back of a length and outside off, tapped to point
good length ball on off stump, defended and India's fans are buzzing at the ground. Chanting, roaring, clapping
good length ball on off stump, eased to point and that's a wicket maiden! Phew, can I borrow someone's nails? Mine are done
back of a length on off stump, Haddin pushes it back to the right of the bowler and Akshar darts across
dired in on middle, Haddin moves outside off and drills it through the covers. That region doesn't have the best cover and Rohit pulls in a big dive to flick the ball back. Very well done
full and fired in on leg stump, Faulkner is struck on the pads and weathers a huge lbw appeal. Would be sliding down leg
good length ball on middle and leg, pushed to extra cover

shake of the head as Dhoni and Akshar and a few thousand India fans appeal in unison. Good length ball meets the sweep, beats it and struck under the knee roll. But perhaps it did not straighten from the angle enough. Umpire's call on clipping leg stump
stays back and chops a flat, length ball into the covers
terrific bowling, but they nab a single into the leg side. Cramps Haddin up with a fuller ball on middle, which was blocked
clattered to the long leg boundary. That's a sweep to a length ball from a medium pacer, and he took the ball right on top of the bounce too. Didn't hurt his timing one bit
down the track and slices a full toss into the covers, Faulkner runs with the shot and leaves Haddin in the lurch. Dhawan takes aim and misses the stumps, with Haddin nowhere in the frame
slower, short and slid down the leg side, Haddin misses with the pull and gets a wide
almost a yorker on middle, yet Haddin clears that front leg and creams it through extra cover. One of the shots of the day, especially in such tense circumstances!
gets a hand to the front-foot belt against a length ball and long-on tidies up
full toss down leg, the Faulkner sweep dusts the game off! He does it time and time again, walks in with a few balls left and a tight game in the balance and swerves it Australia's way
